question_text:
You have a Fabric workspace that contains a lakehouse and a semantic model named Model1.

You use a notebook named Notebook1 to ingest and transform data from an external data source.

You need to execute Notebook1 as part of a data pipeline named Pipeline1. The process must meet the following requirements:

• Run daily at 07:00 AM UTC.
• Attempt to retry Notebook1 twice if the notebook fails.
• After Notebook1 executes successfully, refresh Model1.

Which three actions should you perform? Each correct answer presents part of the solution.

NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

answers.A: Place the Semantic model refresh activity after the Notebook activity and link the activities by using the On success condition.
answers.B: From the Schedule settings of Pipeline1, set the time zone to UTC.
answers.C: Set the Retry setting of the Notebook activity to 2.
answers.D: From the Schedule settings of Notebook1, set the time zone to UTC.
answers.E: Set the Retry setting of the Semantic model refresh activity to 2.
answers.F: Place the Semantic model refresh activity after the Notebook activity and link the activities by using an On completion condition.
